title: Bihar elections phase 1: 121 seats at stake; key constituencies, top candidates
content: Voting has commenced for the initial phase of the Bihar Assembly elections 2025. Over 3.75 crore voters are casting ballots in 121 constituencies. Key leaders like Tejashwi Yadav and Samrat Choudhary are in the fray. Security measures are in place for a smooth process. Several prominent seats are witnessing intense contests, with new voters playing a crucial role.

title: 'Used pillow to muffle cries': Desperate for money, mason, wife kill 65-yr-old
content: A mason and his wife, facing financial hardship, murdered their 65-year-old landlady in Bengaluru to steal her 30gm mangalsutra. The couple, who had rented the ground floor six months prior, confessed to strangling the woman after posing as potential TV buyers. Police arrested them within a day, their suspicious behavior and a missing pillow aiding the investigation.

title: TN hidden camera scandal: Spy cam found in Tata Electronics hostel bathroom; woman, boyfriend held
content: A woman employee and her boyfriend were arrested for installing a hidden camera in a women's hostel bathroom. The camera was found in a room at Vidiyal Residency, a hostel for Tata Electronics employees. The discovery led to protests and many women returning home. Police are investigating for more cameras and reviewing footage.

title: Is MS Dhoni finally retiring? CSK CEO breaks silence - watch
content: Chennai Super Kings CEO Kasi Viswanathan has confirmed MS Dhoni will play in IPL 2026, dispelling immediate retirement rumors. Despite a challenging IPL 2025 season, Dhoni himself stated he has time to decide on his future, emphasizing the physical demands of top-level cricket.

title: Perplexity responds to Amazon’s legal notice; reminds it how it ‘got so big’
content: Perplexity AI has rejected Amazon's 'Cease and Desist' notice, accusing the e-commerce giant of stifling innovation. Amazon demanded Perplexity block its AI agent on the Comet browser from making purchases, citing a degraded user experience. Perplexity argues this is a fight for user choice against Amazon's ad-driven model.

title: 5th mishap in 3 months: Is Mumbai's iconic monorail on right tracks?
content: A monorail coach derailed near Wadala during a system trial, reportedly due to a suspected glitch in the signalling and switching mechanism. The incident, which occurred on the Wadala-GTB Nagar section, saw the coach tilt on the beam. Engineers were testing new technology aimed at improving train control. Minor injuries were sustained by one technical staff member.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 above 25,650; BSE Sensex up over 300 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in green on Thursday. While Nifty50 went above 25,650, BSE Sensex was up over 300 points.

title: Elon Musk 'loves' Trump's Nasa announcement; shares string of emojis
content: Elon Musk expressed delight as President Trump re-nominated Jared Isaacman for NASA Administrator, following weeks of Musk's public criticism of interim administrator Sean Duffy. Duffy had questioned SpaceX's lunar lander schedule, prompting Musk's sharp online retorts. Isaacman's nomination, after an earlier withdrawal due to political donations, now appears to be back on track.

title: Gautam Gambhir pulls Shubman Gill aside for serious chat ahead of 4th T20I - Watch
content: Shubman Gill's batting struggles continue on India's tour of Australia, with low scores in both T20Is and ODIs. Head coach Gautam Gambhir was seen having a serious discussion with the young batter ahead of a crucial T20I. This match presents a key opportunity for Gill to regain form and confidence.

title: Big test for Trump: US Supreme Court raises doubts on legality of reciprocal tariffs
content: The Supreme Court is hearing cases challenging President Trump's reciprocal tariffs, implemented under the International Emergency Economic Powers Act. Justices expressed skepticism regarding the legality of using emergency legislation for broad tariff imposition, questioning potential infringement on congressional taxing authority. The ruling could significantly impact global trade and presidential powers.

title: UP Board exam 2026: Class 10 & 12 schedule out; check & download timetable
content: UP Board timetable 2026 for Class 10 and 12 has been released by the Uttar Pradesh Madhyamik Shiksha Parishad (UPMSP). The matric and intermediate exams will begin from February 18 and continue till March 12, 2026, with morning and afternoon shifts. Students can download the complete datesheet from the official UPMSP website. The schedule includes theory and practical exams for all streams, including Science, Commerce, Arts, Vocational subjects, and languages, along with detailed day-wise and subject-wise timings.

title: Engine fell off: What led to the deadly UPS plane crash in Kentucky?
content: A UPS cargo jet crashed in Louisville after its left engine reportedly detached and caught fire moments after takeoff. The MD-11, carrying a significant fuel load, ignited a massive blaze that spread across a wide area. Investigators have recovered the black boxes and are focusing on the engine failure. All three pilots aboard perished in the incident.

title: Top shares to buy: Stock recommendations for today - check list
content: Top stock market recommendations: Nuvama Professional Clients Group's Deputy Vice President Aakash K Hindocha recommends buying Delhivery, Kalpataru Projects International, and Gravita India. He notes Nifty's recent pullback near 26100 and Bank Nifty's double inside bar formation.

title: 'Talent isn’t enough': Jeff Bezos' offers advice to students
content: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos, in his 2010 Princeton address, urged graduates to prioritise choices over innate talents. He highlighted that while cleverness is a gift, kindness is a deliberate choice. Bezos emphasised that opportunities require courageous action, and a life's meaning is ultimately shaped by the decisions made, not just abilities possessed.

title: Eagles’ Saquon Barkley injury puts Week 10 Game vs Packers in doubt
content: Philadelphia Eagles running back Saquon Barkley's availability for the Week 10 Monday Night Football game against the Green Bay Packers is uncertain. Barkley sustained a groin injury in Week 8. Backup Tank Bigsby performed well in his absence. The team is proceeding cautiously with Barkley's recovery. An official injury report will provide clarity.

title: Lakers legend praises Bronny James after strong game vs Trail Blazers
content: Bronny James showcased a standout performance for the Los Angeles Lakers against the Portland Trail Blazers, contributing five points and six assists. Lakers legend James Worthy lauded the young guard's game, calling it potentially his best yet. Coach JJ Redick also praised Bronny's defensive intensity and physicality, highlighting his significant contributions in a crucial fourth-quarter stretch.

title: Abhishek unstoppable at No.1; Babar climbs nine spots in ICC T20I rankings
content: Abhishek Sharma and Varun Chakravarthy maintain their top positions in the ICC T20I batting and bowling rankings. Pakistan players saw significant gains following their series win over South Africa, with Babar Azam and Saim Ayub making notable jumps.

title: William Nylander opens up on his frustration and Maple Leafs’ struggles
content: William Nylander expressed his frustration with being sidelined due to injury, admitting the waiting game is wearing him down. His absence has impacted the Maple Leafs' offense and overall rhythm. Despite playing limited games, Nylander remains a crucial scorer, and his premature return could jeopardize the team's playoff aspirations.

title: Dubai-based travel influencer Anunay Sood passes away; family urges for privacy
content: Renowned Dubai-based travel influencer and photographer Anunay Sood, aged 32, has tragically passed away. His family confirmed the heartbreaking news via his social media, requesting privacy during this difficult period. Sood, recognized by Forbes India's Top Digital Stars, captivated audiences with his travel documentation. The cause of his untimely demise remains undisclosed.

title: Gujarat riots: 'Hard videographic proof' vanishes; court acquits 3 accused
content: An Ahmedabad court acquitted three men accused in the 2002 riots, citing a lack of evidence. The videographer who claimed to have captured them with firearms, including an AK-47, recanted his statement and the crucial tape vanished. Many witnesses also turned hostile during the 23-year trial, leading to the acquittal.

title: Celina Jaitly urges govt to help free brother Major Vikrant Jaitly detained in UAE
content: Actor Celina Jaitly has expressed deep gratitude after the Delhi High Court issued a notice to the Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) in connection with her brother, Major (Retd.) Vikrant Kumar Jaitly, who has been detained in the UAE since 2024. Celina has now made an emotional appeal to the Government of India to help bring her brother back home.

title: Suryakumar Yadav sends open plea to AB de Villiers: 'Please help me!'
content: Indian T20I captain Suryakumar Yadav admits his T20 success hasn't translated to ODIs, seeking advice from AB de Villiers on balancing formats. He realized his T20 approach wasn't working in the 50-over game.  He also praised Washington Sundar and Jitesh Sharma's match-winning partnership in the recent ODI win.

title: Halloween becomes a night of slaughter: Delhi engineer known for flaunting gold killed by friend
content: A Delhi Jal Board engineer, known for his ostentatious gold jewellery, was murdered by a new acquaintance, Bunty, who saw the engineer's wealth as a quick fortune. Bunty, motivated by soaring gold prices, gained Rathi's trust and fatally stabbed him in his bathroom before stealing the valuables.

title: Ganguly to honour Richa Ghosh with gold bat and ball at Eden Gardens
content: Kolkata gears up to celebrate Richa Ghosh this Saturday as the Cricket Association of Bengal (CAB) honours the 21-year-old World Cup hero at Eden Gardens. Ghosh will receive a gold-plated bat and ball, signed by cricketing legends, for her pivotal role in India's 2025 triumph.

title: After $12.6 billion Amazon stake cut, Jeff Bezos' ex-wife MacKenzie Scott makes one of her biggest donations
content: MacKenzie Scott has gifted Howard University $80 million, one of the largest single donations in its history, to support general operations and its College of Medicine. This significant contribution arrives as the university faces delays in federal funding due to a government shutdown. The donation continues Scott's recent pattern of substantial gifts to diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives.

title: How much water should you drink daily for healthy kidneys and balanced uric acid
content: Maintaining adequate hydration is crucial for managing uric acid levels and preventing conditions like gout and kidney stones. Drinking sufficient water helps the body naturally detoxify, diluting uric acid and facilitating its elimination through the kidneys. This simple habit, combined with a balanced diet and moderate exercise, supports overall kidney health and reduces the risk of uric acid buildup.

title: 'Never seen men so scared': Trump wants his cabinet to 'behave' like Xi’s
content: Donald Trump recounted a meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping, joking about the rigid and silent demeanor of Xi's delegation. He described the Chinese officials as "so scared in their lives" and "at attention," even when addressed directly. Trump humorously expressed a desire for his own cabinet to exhibit similar discipline.

title: RCB set to be sold, likely to get new owner before March 31
content: United Spirits Limited, a Diageo subsidiary, is reviewing its ownership of the Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) franchise, including both men's and women's teams.  The strategic move, expected to conclude by March 2026, aims to focus on USL's core alcohol-beverage business.  Despite a recent controversy, RCB remains a valuable asset due to its star players and strong fan base.

title: US tests ‘doomsday’ ballistic missile days after Trump vows to restart nuclear testing
content: The US Air Force successfully launched an unarmed Minuteman III ICBM, a test scheduled months in advance. This event follows President Trump's recent call to restart nuclear weapons testing, reigniting debate over US nuclear policy and arms control. The Minuteman III remains a crucial part of America's strategic deterrence.

title: Split-screen politics in Bihar: Rahul jabs PM with 'Ambani' remark; RJD feels pinch
content: Rahul Gandhi's recent rally remarks in Bihar, targeting PM Modi's performative politics and corporate ties, subtly highlighted Congress's own aspirations. This comes amid a tense seat-sharing tussle with ally RJD, exposing the INDIA bloc's internal power dynamics. The situation mirrors similar patterns where allies, like RJD, once emerged by eroding Congress's base, now vie for dominance.

title: Puka Nacua’s ex Hallie Aiono shares newborn moments as Rams star reacts
content: Hallie Aiono, ex-girlfriend of Puka Nacua, shared the first photos of their newborn son, Kingston, born October 30. Aiono expressed her joy and gratitude for her baby, calling him a miracle amidst challenging circumstances. The birth comes as a paternity case involving Nacua remains ongoing, drawing public attention to both the new family and the legal proceedings.

title: US govt shutdown breaks record: Trump attacks 'Kamikaze' Democrats; makes big claim
content: US President Donald Trump labelled Democrats 'kamikaze' as the US government shutdown, now the longest in history, enters its sixth week. Millions of federal workers face unpaid leave or working without pay, impacting essential services like airports and welfare programs. A dispute over healthcare spending fuels the deadlock, with both parties showing little willingness to compromise, threatening further chaos.

title: ‘Vote first, refreshments later’: PM Modi’s message to Bihar voters; polling across 121 seats today
content: Bihar is voting today in the first phase of its Assembly elections. Prime Minister Narendra Modi has called on all eligible voters to cast their ballots with enthusiasm. He specifically congratulated young first-time voters. The elections will determine the state's political direction. Major political alliances are competing for control.

title: Ovechkin founding member of NHL's 900-goal club
content: The NHL now has a 900-goal club after Capitals star Alex Ovechkin pushed his record total to a new level Wednesday night, scoring against the Blues to reach 900.

title: Jets demote LB Williams amid defensive shakeup
content: In addition to trading cornerstone players Sauce Gardner and Quinnen Williams, the Jets have demoted former All-Pro linebacker Quincy Williams.

title: Vikes QB McCarthy explains alter ego, viral glare
content: J.J. McCarthy acknowledged his new game-day persona -- "Nine," a reference to his jersey number -- and said it is a product of the anger built up over time missed because of injuries.

title: Panthers' Dowdle fined for '2-pump' celebration
content: Panthers running back Rico Dowdle announced he was fined for his "two-pump" touchdown celebration in Sunday's win over the Packers, with a source telling ESPN the fine was $14,491.

title: Jones unimpressed with 'one-trick pony' Aspinall
content: Former UFC heavyweight champion Jon Jones indicated he was far more impressed with Ciryl Gane than he was with Tom Aspinall in their abbreviated title fight last month, saying he felt Aspinall's wrestling and jiu-jitsu was "incredibly overrated."

title: Sources: LeBron eyes live 5-on-5 play as next step
content: Lakers star LeBron James' next step in his recovery will be taking part in live 5-on-5 reps in practice, sources told ESPN.

title: Cardinals placing QB Murray on injured reserve
content: The Cardinals are placing QB Kyler Murray on IR with a foot injury that kept him out since Week 5, meaning he'll miss at least four more games. Jacoby Brissett will start.

title: Tiger's son joins dad with All-America selection
content: High school junior Charlie Woods, the son of 15-time major champion Tiger Woods, was named a first-team All-American by the AJGA.

title: Graziano & Fowler: What we're hearing on the Jets, Cowboys, Dolphins, Seahawks and more
content: What's the fallout from the Jets' blockbuster trades? What about other moves that did or did not happen around the league? We have the latest.

title: Winners, losers of a wild trade deadline: Solak weighs in on Jets, Cowboys and Jakobi Meyers
content: Well, things escalated quickly. Which teams made the best -- and worst -- moves before the trade deadline?

title: Five key questions that will shape the 2026 women's NCAA bracket
content: The SEC race and Big Ten's nonconference performance could have the biggest impact on the women's NCAA bracket.

title: The real Azzi Fudd?  'None of you have seen it'
content: The Most Outstanding Player of last year's Final Four is ready to level up for the Huskies' repeat bid.

title: MLB offseason rumors and buzz: What we're hearing as free agency begins
content: Will Tarik Skubal be dealt? Who could sign Kyle Schwarber and Kyle Tucker? Here's what we're hearing as the 2025-26 hot stove ignites.

title: From Kyle Schwarber to Alex Bregman: Best fits for top free agents
content: Free agency starts Thursday at 5 p.m. ET. Here are some pairings we'd love to see as this winter gets underway.

title: Dynamic and dangerous vs. Dortmund, Foden must be part of England's World Cup squad
content: England coach Thomas Tuchel knows how good Phil Foden is. But Foden's Champions League brace was a timely reminder of his immense talent.

title: UCL talking points: Flawless Bayern, Slot's switch, VdV's worldie, more
content: Statement wins, end-to-end draws, some shock losses and, to cap it all off, a Puskas contender. ESPN's writers break down the best -- and worst -- from Matchday 4 in the UCL.

title: NBA Power Rankings: Most impactful newcomers on all 30 teams
content: NBA insiders break down the most impactful player, rookie or coach and where all 30 teams stack up in this week's power rankings.

title: Sauce Gardner traded?!? Barnwell on the Colts' risky all-in move and what comes next
content: The Colts shocked the NFL by dealing two first-round picks and Adonai Mitchell to the Jets for Sauce Gardner. But is this the right time to get aggressive?

title: Jets trade Sauce Gardner to Colts: Last piece to Super Bowl puzzle? What's N.Y. thinking?
content: The 7-2 Colts are going all-in on a Super Bowl run, while trading the CB was just part of the Jets' busy day.

title: 'Are you serious?': How the LSU band got a 66 year-old tuba player
content: This season hasn't gone according to plan for LSU, but one member of the school's band is living his dream.

title: Who makes the Olympic hockey cut? Roster predictions for U.S., Canada, more
content: The NHL is back at the Games (Feb. 11-22). Here's a look at which players will make the cut for the big five.

title: How the Kraken's Joey Daccord uses VR for goalie excellence
content: Sense Arena is the first NHL/NHLPA-licensed virtual and mixed-reality platform, and players are using it to train.

title: How the Blue Jays nearly took down a baseball superpower -- and how it could change MLB
content: Toronto almost dethroned the mighty Dodgers by prioritizing contact. Will other teams follow the model?

title: Last Dance: Playoffs will define the MLS legacy of Inter Miami's Fantastic Four
content: With Jordi Alba and Sergio Busquets retiring after the season, it's time for Inter Miami's cast of former Barcelona standouts to put up or shut up.

title: USWNT big board: Girma, Rodman injuries cloud 2027 World Cup plans
content: If the 2027 World Cup started today, which players would be on the UWSNT roster? Jeff Kassouf takes a look at who is -- and who isn't -- going to make the cut.

title: Facts vs. Feelings: J.J. McCarthy, Kimani Vidal and other tough lineup decisions
content: You didn't draft any of these eight guys to be starters, but that doesn't mean you shouldn't consider it.

title: Matchup rankings: Upgrade Wan'Dale Robinson, downgrade Kimani Vidal
content: The most and least favorable matchups for this week's games at the four key positions: QB, RB, WR and TE.

title: Survivor pool strategy: Broncos, Bills among top options in Week 10
content: NFL survivor pool strategy, predictions and picks for ESPN Eliminator Challenge Week 10, including teams to pick or save for later.

title: Is now the best time to trade Austin Reaves?
content: A closer look at Austin Reaves' incredible early-season production, and whether it's wise for fantasy managers to trade him now.

title: What to know ahead of Brazilian Grand Prix sprint weekend
content: Formula 1 has reached round 21 and heads to Interlagos, Brazil for the São Paulo Grand Prix. Everything you need to know for the upcoming sprint weekend.

title: Women's boxing divisional rankings: New No. 1 at junior middleweight
content: Mikaela Mayer is ranked in two divisions following her win over Mary Spencer at 154 pounds. Here are the latest ESPN divisional rankings.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Barcelona, Bayern eyeing Vlahovic
content: Several European clubs are linked with a move for Juventus' Dusan Vlahovic. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: New Bombay HC building should be temple of justice, not seven-star hotel: CJI Gavai
content: CJI Gavai disclosed that initially he was reluctant to attend the foundation stone laying ceremony, but changed his mind when he was told it is not known when a Bombay High Court judge will occupy the top judicial post again

title: OpenAI’s ChatGPT Go free annual subscription rolls out in India
content: One year of access to ChatGPT Go, which is OpenAI’s new, low-cost subscription plan, is available in India for free for a limited period

title: Gujarat Deputy CM Harsh Sanghavi, IPS officers to visit border villages
content: A separate session has been arranged with Border Security Force (BSF) officials to review security-related matters, including patrolling operations and the monitoring of anti-national activities along the border

title: Bihar elections Phase 1 voting LIVE: Polling underway for 121 seats; over 3.75 crore voters to decide fate of big leaders, small parties
content: Several top leaders are in fray in this phase, including the Opposition’s CM face Tejashwi Yadav and over a dozen BJP and JD(U) Ministers in the Nitish government

title: Parakamani case probe: CID sets up temporary office in Tirupati
content: CID DGP Ravi Shankar Ayyanar appeals to the public to share information on the case by dialling 9440700921 or sending emails to adgcid@ap.gov.in

title: BRS cadre protest against ‘cap’ on cotton procurement in Adilabad
content: The situation turned tense after the protesters made a vain attempt to enter into MP’s residence to register their protest against the alleged cap

title: CM Stalin unveils Winners Trophy for Hockey Men’s Junior World Cup
content: The World Cup matches will be held in Chennai and Madurai from November 28 to December 10, according to an official release.

title: Envoy to represent India at COP30 Leaders' Summit; Environment Minister Yadav to join later
content: At COP30, India is expected to underline that developed countries can restore trust by honouring their past commitments and scaling up predictable, grant-based funding for adaptation and loss and damage

title: 'Drishyam'-style murder in Ahmedabad: Man's body buried in his house; wife's paramour held
content: Ansari, who used to work as mason, came to Ahmedabad from Bihar in 2016 after his love marriage with Ruby and the couple has two children

title: NREGA Sangharsh Morcha threatens protests in Bengal if MGNREGA not resumed by December
content: The Supreme Court of India on October 27 has removed all the road blocks in the resumption of the MGNREGA scheme by dismissing the petition of the Union government. Prior to this the Calcutta High Court has directed the resumption of the scheme from August 1

title: Trinamool using SIR to deflect attention from its 14- year misrule in Bengal, says BJP
content: WB BJP president Samik Bhattacharya said that the Trinamool Congress can always approach the Supreme Court if the party has any opposition to the SIR.

title: Siblings arrested in Coimbatore gang rape case were on police watchlist
content: T. Karuppasamy, alias Satheesh, 30, and T. Kaleeswaran, alias Karthik, 21, were among the 3,000 history-sheeters in the list, which included local history-sheeters and those from other districts.

title: Anyone intimidating society through illegal land grabs to be penalized, warns U.P. CM Yogi
content: Mr. Adityanath made the remarks after inaugurating the Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Housing Scheme at Ekta Van in Dalibagh in Lucknow on the occasion of Kartik Purnima where he handed over allotment letters of flats to 72 Economically Weaker Section (EWS) families

title: KKRTC staff urged to take part in sports for physical and mental fitness: chairman Arun Kumar
content: Participation in sports is essential for both physical and mental well-being, said Kalyana Karnataka Road Transport Corporation chairman Arun Kumar Patil

title: Nandini ghee price goes up by ₹90 per kg
content: The Karnataka Milk Federation (KMF) effected a steep increase of nearly 15% on the price of its popular product, Nandini ghee, from Wednesday.

title: ‘No surprise if BJP and alliance do not reach even three digits’: Congress MP Pramod Tiwari ahead of Bihar polls
content: This time, Nitish Kumar's inability to work, his inability to tour, and the way the BJP has ignored him will lead to a reduction in the BJP's seats, the Congress MP said

title: NDA stands for HIRA; Bihar witnessed tremendous growth under Modi, Nitish: BJP president Nadda
content: Mr. Nadda described the RJD as a party of "Rangdari [extortion], Jungle Raj [anarchy] and Dadagiri [intimidation]," and accused its leaders, including Mr. Lalu, Ms. Rabri, Mr. Tejashwi and Misa Bharti, of being out on bail

title: Former Assam MP joins regional party, slams ‘authoritarian’ BJP
content: Rajen Gohain is among those with an RSS past said to be disenchanted with the BJP’s “imported” breed of leaders

title: RCB ownership may change hands; USL initiates strategic review of the investment
content: Investment in sport, although valuable and strategic, is not the company’s core business, says Someshwar, Managing Director, USL

title: SHRC seeks report on condition of ventilators at SAT Hospital
content: Superintendent of Government Medical College Hospital, Thiruvananthapuram, denies  media reports that  11 ventilators at the hospital are not in a working condition. Commission says report must be submitted within a month

title: Labour Minister condemns Pakistan’s abuse of global forum to ‘peddle disinformation’
content: The Union Labour Minister counters Pakistan President Asif Ali Zardari’s statement at the World Summit for Social Development in Doha that India weaponises water

title: Shifting candidates and strategies, parties aim to win the crucial Magadh region in Bihar
content: While the NDA faces the challenge of regaining lost turf in what was once its stronghold, the Mahagathbandhan is going all out to maintain its dominance for the third consecutive term in the Magadh region

title: 38 divisions in Kochi Corporation reserved for women after fresh draw of lots
content: The initial draw was challenged in the High Court for erroneously reserving a division that had already been reserved for women in the 2020 elections

title: 121 Seats Vote In Bihar Polls Phase 1, 13% Turnout Till 9 am: 10 Points
content: The high-profile battle for Bihar has begun, with half the state's 243 seats voting today in the first of the two-phase election. Led by Chief Minister Nitish Kumar, the ruling NDA is hoping for yet another term in the state.

title: Chai, Momos At Lunch Meet: Inside Mamdani's 1st Day As New York Mayor-Elect
content: Zohran Kwame Mamdani, New York's 34-year-old mayor-elect, has tightened his belt to step into his new role by kick-starting his first day after the historic win with some Indian lunch with Democrat firebrand Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez.

title: Trump Says America Lost Little Sovereignty After Mamdani's New York Win
content: US President Donald Trump has declared that America "lost a little bit of its sovereignty" after Democrat socialist Zohran Mamdani won the mayoral election in New York.

title: "8 Planes Shot Down": Trump Updates Key Figure In India-Pak Peace Claim
content: US President Donald Trump has repeated his claim of brokering peace between India and Pakistan, revising his count of fighter jets downed during the combat from seven to eight.

title: Bihar Assembly Elections Phase 1 2025 Live Updates: Lalu Yadav, Tejashwi Early Voters As 121 Bihar Seats Go To Polls In Phase 1
content: The first phase of the Bihar assembly polls saw several senior political figures cast their votes early on Thursday. Among the early voters were RJD leader and INDIA bloc Chief Minister candidate Tejashwi Yadav

title: Philippines Declares State Of Emergency After Typhoon Kalmaegi Kills 114
content: The deaths were mostly from drowning in flash floods, and 127 people were still missing, many in the hard-hit central province of Cebu. The tropical cyclone blew out of the archipelago on Wednesday into the South China Sea.

title: Bengaluru Couple Murders Landlady, Flees With Her Gold Mangalsutra, Arrested
content: In a shocking case of murder and robbery, police have arrested a tenant couple for allegedly killing their landlady and stealing her gold mangalsutra in Uttarahalli, Bengaluru.

title: US To Cut 10% Of Flights At 40 Major Airports Amid Longest Shutdown
content: The shutdown, now in its 36th day and the longest in US history, has forced 13,000 air traffic controllers and 50,000 Transportation Security Administration agents to work without pay.

title: Apple To Use Google's Gemini Model To Run New Siri: Report
content: Apple plans to use a 1.2 trillion-parameter artificial intelligence model developed by Alphabet's Google to help power a revamp of its Siri voice assistant, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.

title: 80,000 Non-Immigrant Visas Revoked Since Trump Took Office: US Official
content: President Donald Trump's administration has revoked around 80,000 non-immigrant visas since its inauguration on January 20 for offenses ranging from driving under the influence to assault and theft, a senior State Department official said.

title: 6-Year-Old Dies After Swing Falls On Her At Kartik Purnima Fair In UP
content: A six-year-old girl died and five others were injured when a swing suddenly fell down at the Kartik Purnima Fair here on Wednesday evening, police said.

title: Trump Pressed Xi To Release Jailed Hong Kong Media Tycoon: Reports
content: US President Donald Trump appealed directly to China's Xi Jinping to free jailed Hong Kong media tycoon Jimmy Lai when the two leaders met in South Korea last week, according to three people briefed on the talks and a US administration official.

title: "IPO Not On The Cards": OpenAI's Chief Financial Officer
content: OpenAI has ramped up spending on data centers, striking multibillion-dollar deals with tech giants including Alphabet's Google and Amazon.

title: Varanasi Ghats Dazzle In Divine Splendour As Dev Deepawali Lights Up Ganga
content: The ghats of Varanasi turned into a celestial panorama on Wednesday evening as lakhs of 'diyas' (earthen lamps) illuminated the banks of the river Ganga during the grand celebration of 'Dev Deepawali'.

title: Empty Monorail Train Hits Beam During Mumbai Test Run, 3 Staffers Injured
content: An empty coach of a newly procuredmonorail train derailed and hit a beam during a test run at Wadala depot in Mumbai on Wednesday morning, leaving three staffers, including the train captain, injured and causing severe damage to the carriage.

title: Union Minister Sukanta Majumdar's Convoy Attacked In Bengal's Nabadwip
content: The convoy of Union Minister of State for Education and former state president of the BJP in West Bengal, Sukanta Majumdar, was allegedly attacked by the Trinamool Congress activists at Nabadwip in Nadia district of West Bengal on Wednesday night.

title: Musk A Trillionaire? Debate Over Tesla CEO's Pay Package Rages
content: Elon Musk turned off many potential buyers of his Tesla cars and sent sales plunging with his foray into politics. But the stock has soared anyway and now he wants the company to pay him more  a lot more.

title: Bihar Elections 2025: Lalu Yadav And The Story Of The Charwaha Schools
content: Long before he stood on the floor of the Lok Sabha and delivered his signature one-liners, making even his opponents laugh, Lalu Prasad Yadav's story began in Bihar's Phulwaria village.

title: Hyderabad Man Seeks Lift From 4, Later Killed Over Spilt Chutney At Eatery
content: A 45-year-old painter was brutally murdered by three men and a teenager in the Hyderabad's Nacharam area following a trivial argument over spilled chutney. The victim, Murali Krishna, was allegedly tortured for two hours before being stabbed to death

title: The Mandal Wave: Reservations That Changed Bihar And India Forever
content: Six weeks after former Prime Minister VP Singh announced in his 1990 Independence Day speech the implementation of the Mandal Commission recommendations, Delhi's streets were filled with student-led demonstrations.

title: Yet another straight duel between LDF and UDF on the cards in Pala
content: The once-uneasy alliance between the CPI(M) and KC(M) has evolved into a cohesive partnership with strong grassroots chemistry, while the UDF looks to win back what once its bastion. The Bharatiya Janata Party, buoyed by an expanding ground network, looks to play the dark horse

title: Stubble-burning area in key Punjab districts 20% lower than last year
content: In the week from October 28 to November 4, fire counts have tripled; citing the recent data, expert says reduction in area set afire in three major districts a positive sign

title: FATF releases updated asset recovery framework; India played a key role, says Enforcement Directorate
content: The guidance follows up on one of the most significant global reforms to the FATF standards on confiscation and international cooperation in over three decades, the ED said

title: Defeat BJP-JD(U) to rid Bihar of unemployment, migration, 'goonda raj': Congress' appeal to voters
content: Congress general secretary Jairam Ramesh alleged that the NDA has pushed Bihar's bright future into darkness for the sake of its own "power-hungry interests"

title: Archives department to preserve satirist Veloor’s handwritten manuscripts
content: Department decides to take over 20 of Veloor’s most significant handwritten manuscripts, conserve and return them to his kin

title: Bihar polls: JD(U)’s Lalan claims FIR based on ‘doctored’ video
content: Lalan expressed confidence that the investigation will take into account “the full video footage” and will lead to his exoneration

title: Police file FIR in Bilaspur train crash
content: Police say initial findings by Railways, which suggest that the passenger train’s crew failed to control the train at a red signal, will be part of their probe; Commissioner of Railway Safety to begin investigation, says government

title: Chhattisgarh train collision: With parents dead, relatives of toddler who survived worried about his future
content: Rishi, around two years old, sustained injuries on his head and legs in train accident in Chhattisgarh’s Bilaspur

title: First phase of Bihar polls on November 6 will decide the fate of big leaders and small parties
content: The Opposition’s CM face Tejashwi Yadav is in the fray, as are Deputy CMs Samrat Choudhary and V.K. Sinha; crucial test for CPI(ML), LJP(RV), VIP; in 2020, Mahagatbandhan won 63 of 121 seats going to polls

title: Telangana CM Revanth Reddy mocks KTR’s debate challenge, asks him to engage with Cantonment MLA
content: Says Congress workers were not taking the BRS working president’s latest challenge seriously since he had “run away” from earlier debates

title: Only Central govt., not the State, has jurisdiction over BMRCL’s industrial disputes: Karnataka High Court
content: Court also quashes State govt.’s notifications declaring BMRCL’s services as ‘public utility’ and ‘essential services’

title: Three-way contest sharpens in Jubilee Hills as voting day draws near
content: Parties are eyeing the Muslim vote, estimated at around 1.4 lakh of the constituency’s little over 4 lakh electors

title: BJP to mark 150 years of ‘Vande Mataram’ with nationwide recitations from November 7
content: Prime Minister Modi likely to attend central event in Delhi as BJP plans celebrations at 150 iconic sites across the country

title: Caste survey delay, internal disagreements stall GBA ward delimitation
content: The entire exercise was designed to culminate in the publication of draft ward-wise electoral rolls by December first week, followed by a period of claims and objections until late December, and the final publication of the rolls on January 29, 2026, crucial for keeping the city’s long-pending civic polls on track

title: Tribal family to World Cup glory: Kranti Goud’s journey from a backup player in boys’ team to India pacer
content: Like many of her peers in India’s World Cup winning team, Kranti’s story too began in a small town as she navigated through resistance, challenges, lack of resources and financial hardships to the historic moment at the DY Patil Stadium on the night of November 2, 2025

title: Cabinet decides to regularise contract workers at KPPL
content: A total of 181 contract employees to be offered permanent position at the Kerala Paper Products Limited

title: 2025 Kerala local body polls: Kochi, Thrissur, Kannur to have women Mayors
content: The Mayor posts in Kochi, Thrissur and Kannur Corporations have been reserved for women in the next term, according to a 2025 local body elections notification issued by the State Election Commission (SEC)

title: India’s new AI governance guidelines push hands-off approach
content: While an earlier draft focussed on minimising risks, the new framework seeks to promote innovation with guardrails, without “throttling” AI adoption; Centre has no immediate plan to introduce a new AI law

title: Karnataka to introduce AI as part of reforms for district judiciary

"the election in J&K was meant to restore trust and dignity, not to replace one silence with another," the opposition says .

title: Not ceremonial like in India, US mayors are CEOs of cities
content: new york, los Angeles and Chicago are among cities that follow the 'strong-mayor system' in which mayors don't report to a political executive, like in india, but draw their powers directly from the Constitution . the mayor is largely ceremonial, with little executive authority .

title: Agniveer wounded in J&K’s Kishtwar, hunt on for 3 terrorists
content: the joint operation by army and police began after intelligence inputs pointed to the presence of terrorists in the area . forces cordoned off the forest and launched a search, which quickly escalated into an exchange of fire . at least three terrorists are hiding there, a source said .

title: EC hits back at Rahul, asks why didn't you file appeal
content: Bharti Jain is senior editor with The Times of India, New Delhi. She has been writing on security matters since 1996. Having covered the Union home ministry, security agencies, Election Commission and the ‘prime’ political beat, the Congress, for The Economic Times all these years, she moved to TOI in August 2012. Her repertoire of news stories delves into the whole gamut of issues related to terrorism and internal strife, besides probing strategic affairs in India’s neighbourhood. Read More

And when she is not chasing schools, headmasters and teachers, she turns her focus to crime. Her entry into journalism was purely accidental: a trained commercial artist, she landed her first job as a graphic designer with a weekly, but less than a fortnight later set aside the brush and picked up the pen. title: Women's college volleyball Bracketology: Top seedings, bracket watch and more

title: Week 11 Anger Index: The case for outrage over BYU's and Miami's CFP rankings

title: Champions League as it happened: Man City breeze past BVB, six goals in Brugge-Barça
content: We are back with  UEFA Champions League  action as we had some great matches on this second day of Matchday 4. Manchester City  were able to win with ease against  Borussia Dortmund  by winning 4-1 at the Etihad. It was goals galore in Belgium as  Club Brugge  and  Barcelona  played to a six-goal thriller that ended in a 3-3 draw. Also, we had  Newcastle United  beating  Athletic Club  2-0 and  Internazionale  beating  Kairat Almaty  2-1. Enjoy all the action from Wednesday's matches.

title: The Bilas Index: Jay Bilas picks his top 68 teams this season
content: the Bilas Index is the most powerful and consequential instrument of basketball wisdom and judgment known to humankind . it serves as much more than a guide or a road map to this men's college basketball season . the Bilastrator's immense and powerful brain is superior in processing basketball performance, potential and ability .
